full_summary:
**Solicitation for National Individual Standing Offer (NISO)**
=============================================

### Title:
Emroidered Name Tag

### Reference Number:
cb-288-74823662

### Solicitation Number:
202401985

### Publication Date:
2024-01-10

### Tender Closing Date:
2024-02-07 14:00:00

### Amendment Date:
2024-02-07

### Tender Status:
Expired

### Procurement Category:
Goods and Services (GD)

### Notice Type:
Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

### Procurement Method:
Competitive - Open Bidding

### Selection Criteria:
Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements:
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Solicitation Description:
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires a National Individual Standing Offer (NISO) for the supply of embroidered name tags. The requirement is subject to certain trade agreements and is limited to Canadian goods. The procurement will occur in two phases: Phase 1 is an expression of interest, and Phase 2 is the solicitation with specific details.

### Phase 1: Expression of Interest
* Interested Offerors must complete and sign the attached Submission of Interest form and Non-Disclosure and Confidentiality of Information Agreement (NDCIA).
* The signed form and NDCIA must be sent via email to the Standing Offer Authority.
* Only submissions received by the tender closing date will be considered.

### Phase 2: Request for Standing Offer
* Interested Offerors who submit a complete and signed Submission of Interest form and NDCIA will receive the solicitation package, including specifications and associated documentation.
* The basis of selection is the responsive offer with the lowest Total Evaluated Unit Price (TEUP).

### Important Information
* The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for identifying Indigenous business capacity.
* Interested Offerors are encouraged to have a business profile in the IBD to increase their visibility and access to federal government contracts.
* The procurement is subject to the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.

### Request for Contact Information
If you have any questions or require clarification on this solicitation, please do not hesitate to contact Marie-Eve Brunet at marie-eve.brunet@rcmp-grc.gc.ca or (514) 208-1137.    -
